entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 28.
